QUALIFIER.NAME: Description
QUALIFIER.VALUE: The Role object class is used to represent a position or set of responsibilities within an organization, organizational unit or other scope. When explicitly restricting the target elements that may be accessed from this Role, this association MUST be used.

QUALIFIER.NAME: Description
QUALIFIER.VALUE: The Role whose target set is explicitly defined.

QUALIFIER.NAME: Description
QUALIFIER.VALUE: Reference to the target set that can be accessed from the Role.
